text:
@realDonaldTrump When you can’t run on I made America great again...

When your go to ....Racism is losing it’s luster...

You can’t even mention Coronavirus...

Can’t run on jobs or the economy...

When Joe is a centrist so you can’t do the whole Socialism..

You come up with this?? 😭😭😭
